content: @Grahame Grieve I created a value set that should include 3 other value sets, but it is not expanding as I expected. Is this a tooling issue or did I do something wrong? http://build.fhir.org/valueset-care-plan-activity-status-reason.html
that's a tooling error. can you make a task to remind me to look at it please

Should this valueset be rendering correctly? (or something wrong with it I need to fix)
http://build.fhir.org/valueset-service-type.html

This value set could not be expanded by the publication tooling: Error from server: The code system definition for http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/service-type is a example, so this expansion is not permitted unless the expansion parameter "incomplete-ok" has a value of "true"
well, it turns out that that should not be an example, and @Lloyd McKenzie is all hot under the collar about this

I do think we need to fix this generally (however we decide is going to best to do that). These warnings, and even errors and prohibition in this case, don't seem to be very helpful and expected, to say the least.
